experience.title: Freelance developer
experience.description: I founded my own company, Neliotek, to work as a freelance developer. My primary client is my former team at Thales, and I also collaborate with other teams that seek my expertise in Kibana plugin development or my knowledge in other domains.

experience.title: Tech leader
experience.description: In 2018, I initiated a new project with my manager aimed at helping software engineers identify bugs by parsing logs.

experience.title: Test manager
experience.description: I was responsible for the testing platform used by the development team in my previous role. The challenge involved finalizing ongoing work related to testing through Docker and establishing a platform to test the software at scale.

experience.title: Software engineer
experience.description: I joined the team from my internship as a C/C++ developer. My role involved developing new features and troubleshooting issues. I also suggested enhancements, such as transitioning to CMake for the compilation process, which reduced compilation time from over an hour to just fifteen minutes.

experience.title: Internship as software engineer
experience.description: This was my final internship, the topic was to integrate a proprietary routing protocol into a Quagga router and implement redistribution to civilian protocols.

experience.title: Web developer
experience.description: I completed my first internship as a web developer at the Montpellier laboratory, working on a web application for researchers. I had the opportunity to continue in a student position, where I developed new features for the software. This was an excellent way to earn money to fund my studies while gaining valuable experience.
